LonoRobot.welcomeToLono|block: Welcome to LonoDIY. If you encounter any problems, please follow Xiaohongshu yy超爱玩
LonoRobot.displayText|block: Display the text [TEXT], starting point x=[X], y=[Y]
LonoRobot.moveJoint|block: Rotate the joint [JOINT] to [ANGLE] degrees, movement duration [DURATION] milliseconds
LonoRobot.getTrim|block: Get the deviation of the joint [JOINT]
LonoRobot.setTrim|block: Set the deviation of the joint [JOINT] to [TRIM]
LonoRobot.setTrimByJointIdx|block: Set the deviation of the joint [JOINTIDX] to [TRIM]
LonoRobot.addCustomMotion|block: Add a custom action (up to 4 supported) [TIME] milliseconds, right shoulder [R1], right elbow [R2], right wrist [R3], right leg [R4], right foot [R5], left shoulder [L1], left elbow [L2], left wrist [L3], left leg [L4], left foot [L5]
LonoRobot.previewSingleFrame|block: Preview an action [TIME] milliseconds, right shoulder [R1], right elbow [R2], right wrist [R3], right leg [R4], right foot [R5], left shoulder [L1], left elbow [L2], left wrist [L3], left leg [L4], left foot [L5]
LonoRobot.playCustomMotion|block: Execute the custom action; from the [START]th to the [END]th
LonoRobot.moveForward|block: Action Move forward [STEP] steps, movement duration [DURATION] milliseconds
LonoRobot.moveBackward|block: Action Move backward [STEP] steps, movement duration [DURATION] milliseconds
LonoRobot.moveLeft|block: Action Move left [ STEP] steps, movement duration [DURATION] milliseconds
LonoRobot.moveRight|block: Action Move right [ STEP] steps, movement duration [DURATION] milliseconds
LonoRobot.drawCircle|block: Draw a circle, center x=[X], y=[Y], radius=[R]
LonoRobot.drawSolidCircle|block: Draw a solid circle, center x=[X], y=[Y], radius=[R]
LonoRobot.drawEllipse|block: Draw an ellipse, center x=[X], y=[Y], X-axis radius=[RX], Y-axis radius=[RY]
LonoRobot.drawFilledEllipse|block: Draw a filled ellipse, center x=[X], y=[Y], X-axis radius=[RX], Y-axis radius=[RY]
LonoRobot.drawFilledBOX|block: Draw a filled rectangle, top-left corner x=[X], y=[Y], width=[W], height=[H]
LonoRobot.drawBOX|block: Draw a rectangle, top-left corner x=[X], y=[Y], width=[W], height=[H]
LonoRobot.drawTriangle|block: Draw a triangle, the first point x=[X1], y=[Y1], the second point x=[X2], y=[Y2], the third point x=[X3], y=[Y3]
LonoRobot.drawArc|block: Draw an arc, center x=[X], y=[Y], radius=[R], start angle=[SA], end angle=[EA]
LonoRobot.drawLine|block: Draw a line, starting point x=[X], y=[Y], ending point x=[X1], y=[Y1]
LonoRobot.tone|block: Set the buzzer frequency to [FREQ] Hertz, beat to [BEAT]
LonoRobot.alternatelyTone|block: Alternate sounds [SOUND1] and [SOUND2], each sound duration [VD] milliseconds, each silent duration [SD] milliseconds, repeat times [TIMES]
LonoRobot.progressiveTone|block: Progressive sound, start frequency=[SOUND1], end frequency=[SOUND2], change ratio=[RATIO], sound duration=[VD] milliseconds, silent duration=[SD] milliseconds
